Reviews.Title: “Dispointed - Not worth the money that paid for”

Reviews.Content: couldnt believe hotel 91 reviewers recommended tripadvisor 25th october husband checked lobby entered elevator weve seen elevator barely fit 2 luggage 2 carryon baggage skinny person inside standard laying luggage move anymore drainage toilet slow iron nor iron board inside housekeeping available request free bottle water provided requested facial tissues box day computer inside free internet unless brought own laptop happy hotel services guy front desk helped print boarding passes twice free charge able provide answers questions taxi easily help guys front door wouldnt called bellboys wearing black suits hats location central helpful free shuttle van provided hotel tiny size standard elevator slow drainage toilet worth pay cdn 130 night iron available inside free bottle water
